title: Frontier supercomputer powers first nuclear
description: Tech startup Atomic Canyon has harnessed the power of the Frontier supercomputer to train the first nuclear-specific Artificial Intelligence model.
content:

title: Wall Street mixed as worries about AI bubble drag down tech sector
description: Trading on Wall Street is mixed in the premarket as worries persisted about a potential bubble in artificial-intelligence technology
content:

title: Oracle’s stumble hits AI trade, but many remain bullish
description: The red-hot trade backing artificial intelligence-related stocks has taken a bruising from a disappointing report from Oracle, reigniting concerns about frothy valuations and an AI bubble
content:

title: SCDNR warns public not to rely on AI, search results when confirming hunting, fishing laws
description: The agency warned that answers generated by artificial intelligence may be pulled from incorrect or dated information.
content:

title: ChatGPT's alleged role in murder-suicide prompts lawsuit
description: The heirs of an 83-year-old Connecticut woman are suing ChatGPT maker OpenAI and its business partner Microsoft for wrongful death, alleging that the artificial intelligence chatbot intensified her son’s “paranoid delusions” and helped direct them at his mother before he killed her.
